vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to act unfaithfully, act treacherously, transgress, commit a trespass
1a) (Qal) to act unfaithfully or treacherously
1a1) against man
1a2) against God
1a3) against devoted thing
1a4) against husband
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 行為不忠, 行為奸詐
1a) (Qal) 行為不忠或奸詐
1a1) 對人
1a2) 對神
1a3) 對奉獻聖物
1a4) 對丈夫
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 行为不忠, 行为奸诈
1a) (Qal) 行为不忠或奸诈
1a1) 对人
1a2) 对神
1a3) 对奉献圣物
1a4) 对丈夫
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Gloss: 行為不忠, 行為奸詐
vocabInfos._zh_Gloss: 行为不忠, 行为奸诈
